problem.markdown:
The base of the pyramid shown above is a regular hexagon with side of length 12. If point O is the center of the base and the length of OB is 15, what is the degree measure of angle OAB to the nearest whole number?

= 51
problem.p: The base of the pyramid shown above is a regular hexagon with side of length 12. If point O is the center of the base and the length of OB is 15, what is the degree measure of angle OAB to the nearest whole number?
